title: 216: Matt’s Bachelor Recap: Episode 2 (…And Queen Victoria Is Still Here)
itunes:title: 216: Matt’s Bachelor Recap: Episode 2 (…And Queen Victoria Is Still Here)
description:
The Broads get into the second episode of Matt James’ Bachelor season! First they discuss some recent “news” about current contestants and then dive into the women they are loving so much, too much Victoria, ATV accidents, bridal dress photoshoots turned battles (?!), eyes open kissing, producer placed orchids, and much more!


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***TALKSPACE: Use the code CHATTY at talkspace.com to get $100 off of your first month and show your support for the show!
